name: Five Torturous Nights With Afton
description:
This is the third and final of the games that will tell the story of what happened between Freddy Fazbear's Pizzaria Simulator and FNaF VR: Help Wanted.

My Youtube channel, where I play this: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyAwuR21ZhL_mB67A8FtNaA?

Credit to Scott Cawthon for the original idea.

Play this on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/420315547/

My Scratch Account: https://scratch.mit.edu/users/ThoseFiveNights24/
